copyBlock.h1: Step Up To The Ultima Series™
copyBlock.copy: Step up to the ultimate all-around mowing experience with the Cub Cadet’s award winning Ultima Series™. This line of zero-turn mowers delivers next-level comfort, speed and control at the quality you’ve come to expect.

introZTXS.h3:
The Ultima Series™ Zero-Turn with
Commercial-Grade Features
introZTXS.p: From tight turns to inclined hillsides and stretching valleys, the Ultima ZTXS is built to help tackle your yard’s unique challenges. The Ultima ZTXS brings Cub Cadet’s innovative and proprietary Synchro-Steer<sup>™</sup> technology to the proven Ultima Series<sup>™</sup> platform for reliable precision and confident control.

button.copy: Learn more about the Ultima ztxs

blocks.title: Forged to deliver strength and durability:
blocks.copy: A continuous square 2 in. x 2 in. tubular steel frame corrosion defense coating enhances strength and durability for long lasting use. Optional roll bar increases rider safety.

blocks.title: Designed to tackle unique terrains:
blocks.copy: Combines commercial-grade features and zero-turn steering wheel with Sychro-Steer(TM) technology designed to provide stability and confidence while mowing large areas with tough hills and varied terrain. Available on select models.

quote.title: LOOK NO MORE FOR A GREAT MOWER.
quote.copy: This Cub Cadet mower is a beast. I absolutely love it and all of its features. Honestly, I haven’t found one negative thing to say about it since I’ve bene using it. Needless to say, I love this mower!”
quote.name: Twwagoner from Lexington, NC

blocks.quote: After my first mow I asked myself “why did I wait so long to buy a zero turn”. This mower is amazing!!! Love it!!!
blocks.author: Mowmaster, Knoxville TN

blocks.quote: Just bought my second Cub cadet zero turn. This bad boy is the Cadillac of residential mowers. I am the envy of the neighborhood. Love my new ZT2 54" zero turn
blocks.author: Dr Evil, Lancaster PA

blocks.title: Lap Bars
blocks.copy: Overmolded and fully adjustable rubber hand grips generate less vibration.

blocks.title: Steering Wheel
blocks.copy: Synchro-Steer™ technology provides enhanced precision, control and stability on hills up to 20 degrees.

find.h2: Find the Best Ultima for You
find.copy: Our technicians have prepared 8 questions for you in order to find your perfect zero-turn mower.

blocks.copy: Built in Martin, Tennessee using the highest quality components sourced locally and globally.
Three year/no-hour limited warranty plus limited lifetime warranty on frame and fabricated Aeroforce Deck shell.

financing.copy: The offers below are available online. Additional financing offers may be available at your local dealer.

blocks.title: No interest if paid in full within 12 months<sup>2</sup>
blocks.copy: Interest will be charged from the purchase date if the purchase balance is not paid in full by the end of the promotional period or if you make late payments.

blocks.title: 0% APR for 24 months with equal payments<sup>3</sup>
blocks.copy: There is a promotional fee of $125 for this transaction.

blocks.title: 0% APR for 36 months with equal payments<sup>5</sup>
blocks.copy: There is a promotional fee of $125 for this transaction.
blocks.term: Offer valid on Zero Turns only (RZT, Ultima, Z-Force and Pro-Z). Minimum purchase $3,000
